oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Terry McBride - 2017-10-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriter Terry McBride from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 21, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Terry McBride;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Muted audio / (00:08) Opening comments in progress and songwriter introduction by Abi Tapia / (03:26) Opening comments by Terry / (05:00) Performs Sacred Ground / (08:32) Talks about previous song / (09:04) Talks about promotional tour for latest recording, his past recording history / (10:51) Performs excerpt of I Am That Man and talks about Ronnie Dunn and the next song / (13:50) Performs excerpt of If You See Him, If You See Her / (14:49) Talks about the next song / (17:08) Performs Cowgirls Don't Cry / (20:31) Answers question about his vocal stamina / (21:44) Answers question about the guitar he's playing / (23:10) Answers question about his background and his parents / (26:30) Answers question about songwriting and talks about Chris Stapleton and Jon Pardi / (28:28) Answers question about the difficulty of co-writing / (29:50) Answers question about his favorite song / (30:20) Performs excerpt of Can I Count On You /

(31:07) Continues story of the previous song becoming a hit / (32:12) Tells stories about filling in on bass for Brooks and Dunn / (34:59) Performs Boots Off / (37:53) Talks about Jerry Reed, Don Schlitz and Alan Jackson and closing comments / (40:07) Performs Play Something Country / (42:28) Final comments / (42:38) Walk-out music / (42:51) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McBride, Terry; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
